properties.name: spring.h2.console.enabled
properties.description: Enable the H2 console UI. Default is 'true' when H2 is on the classpath.

properties.name: llm.provider
properties.description: LLM provider to use (openai, anthropic, local)

properties.name: llm.openai.model
properties.description: OpenAI model to use (gpt-4, gpt-3.5-turbo, etc.)
